properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Adyanta rahitudu ala..... omega tane, Adisambhutudu asamanundaina kristu , Sarvalokamunakai gorrepillaga baliyai, Mrtula nundi lecina sajivudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhumyakasamula karta bhujanula raksanakarta, Sarvasrsá¹­i karta samadhana karta , Papavimuktikai raktamu cindimpa, Abhisiktudaina kristesudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I prabhuve stotrarhudu aradhanaku patrudu, Rajula raju yesu ebinejarai yunnadu, Najareyundagu yesu vijayundailecenu, Nijaraksakundani bhajiyintumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tandri mahimanu vidacenu marana padhamuna nadicenu, Srimantudaina prabhuvu manakai daridrudayen, Marumanassu ponda kanikaramuna manninci, Niti tircina premamayudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rarajai ranunnadu. Yugayugamula rajyamelan, Nyayadhipatiga vaccun andariki tirpu tircan, Ihaparamulaku ghanatamahimalaku, Prabhuvula prabhuvanucu pranutintumu{/lang-eng}
